summary.span: 命名空間 (Namespace) 包含用於將物件序列化為 XML 格式文件或資料流的類別。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that are used to serialize objects into XML format documents or streams.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空間中的中央類別是類別。The central class in the namespace is the class. 若要使用這個類別，使用建構函式來建立此類別使用的物件類型要序列化的執行個體。To use this class, use the constructor to create an instance of the class using the type of the object to serialize. 一次已建立，建立要序列化的物件的執行個體。Once an is created, create an instance of the object to serialize. 您也必須建立物件，以將檔案寫入的文件或資料流，例如， ，或。You must also create an object to write the file to a document or stream, such as a , , or . 您可以接著呼叫將物件轉換成 XML 文件的方法。You can then call the method to convert the object into an XML document. 從 XML 文件將物件還原序列化，建立適合的物件，來讀取文件或資料流 (同樣地， ， ，或)。To deserialize an object from an XML document, create a suitable object to read the document or stream (again, a , , or ). 叫用方法並將結果物件的原始物件 （序列化） 的型別轉型。Invoke the method while casting the resulting object to the type of the original object (that was serialized). 若要進一步控制序列化命名空間包含數個可以套用至類別的成員的類別。To further control the serialization, the namespace contains several classes that can be applied to members of a class. 例如，如果類別未包含的成員，將序列化為 XML 項目，您可以套用屬性的成員。For example, if a class contains a member that will be serialized as an XML element, you can apply the attribute to the member. 當套用此屬性，您可以指定詳細資料，例如在實際 XML 項目名稱中使用屬性。When applying the attribute, you can specify details such as the actual XML element name using the property. 如需所有屬性的完整清單，請參閱類別概觀。For a complete list of all the attributes, see the class overview.
